amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which provides for a mandatory life sentence for a violation of section 2243(a) as a second sex offense against a minor; and add language which increases the maximum possible term for a second offense to a term up to life imprisonment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section providing for a life imprisonment maximum for certain repeat sex offenders against children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
